Name: PlayerScope
Author: SicakBirTebess√ºm
Description:
Keeps track of players and who a retainer belongs to. Alt characters can also be tracked if they have been seen before.
--Currently only for whitelisted players.
Changelog:
- A new tab has been added to display the distribution of Characters and Retainers across different Worlds
- The 'Settings' tab is now available (currently only for debugging purposes)
- You can now send a character's location directly from any list (Before, they had to be near the plugin user)
- An 'Adv. Plate' button has been added next to the results in the PlayerSearch window.
